isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - AERODYNAMIC PANELS - CAB SKIRT PANELS 92/9400 (LONG DESIGN)

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: The cab skirts have 3 or 4 panels (sections) depending on the vehicle model. Each panel (section) can be removed separately. To remove left side skirt panels, start at the rear panel and move forward. To install, start at front and move rearward. To remove right side skirt panels, start at front and move rearward. To install, start at rear and move forward.
The following procedures are for removing and installing all the panels and the panel support frame separately or as a complete unit.
